about_the_game:
Translate this into English, but keep the formatting that is done with tags for Steam.

The Solar Queen - a smuggler's ship where fate has brought a battle captain of the star fleet. The crew - just three people, but what a team... A former courtesan - a board mechanic, an engineer - a crazy genius, a navigator - a dropout student.
Can you, Captain, the elite of the military fleet, turn this rabble into a team by getting the ship out of all the troubles, or will they turn you into one of them?

The ship control here is simple, but don't expect a smooth flight.
Welcome to the secret paths of smugglers, the world of caves of altered space, where even the slightest inaccuracy and everything! Finita la commedia!

Don't despair, the ship's crew will help you!(Actually, no ;)

  • The board mechanic isn't in the mood? - Get a 10x boost from the engines. Or wait, are we flying on just one this time?
  • The navigator slept through another gravitational anomaly?- Get ready to scrape your remains off the floor.
  • The engineer found a new way to move through space? - The previous cave will seem like a simple walk to you.
  • Everyone collectively forgot to refuel the ship? - Grow wings or learn to glide while it's not too late.

And the Captain himself. A warrior dismissed from the Fleet for his obstinate character. What kind of captain is he?
Will you fly carefully, calmly plotting your route and melancholically practicing the tricks of your team and space dislocations?
Or are you a virtuoso pilot capable of fulfilling 3 "Ace Trials" on each level? Crashing a couple of hundred times.

But in the end, you all love your Solar Queen and your job in your own way.

  • Progressive difficulty:
Begin the game with simple levels and gain experience before each subsequent one starts showing you new depths of despair.
Original levels:
About 50 tasks await your team, each with new twists of space, anomalies, crazy gravity, complex level terrain, flying obstacles, and other eye-catching deadly traps.
  • Steam challenges and achievements:
Each level contains 3 optional challenges unlocking achievements in Steam. Optional, but it's in them that all the fun lies. Can you pass the level without lifting your foot off the gas pedal? And do 3 somersaults while doing so? And dodge the flying boulders?
Did someone from the crew get sick? Well, you shouldn't be the only one suffering from their antics, right?
  • Feedback:
The team will not miss the opportunity to sarcastically comment on your "skills" in controlling the ship. Oh, they'll have something to say to you.

short_description: The Solar Queen - an arcade disaster simulator. Your "professional" spaceship crew will break every part on board, get you into a thousand troubles, and make you learn high-flying stunts with just one engine.
